nodes.text: Pylum was the Master of Cerements on Necropolis. During the year 0 ABY he participated with Doctor Cornelius Evazan as part of the Project Starscream. When Zak and Tash Arranda arrived in the world of Necropolis he pretended to be a strong believer of the Curse of Sycorax, but in reality he had discovered that the curse of sycorax was just a fabrication. Pylum died in Evazan's lab in 0 ABY.
